overview: Sting & The Giant join forces to take on The Outsiders with the WCW Tag Team Championship on the line. "Macho Man" Randy Savage faces Bret "The Hitman" Hart with "Rowdy" Roddy Piper serving as special guest referee. Eric Bischoff issues a challenge to Vince McMahon. Goldberg defends the WCW United States Championship. Plus, Eddy Guerrero and more!
tagline: The Strong Survive. The Ruthless Win.
title: WCW Slamboree 1998
